## Experience

### Senior Product Designer
**Company Name** | 2020 - Present

Led end-to-end design for multiple digital products, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centered solutions.

### Product Designer
**Previous Company** | 2017 - 2020

Designed and shipped features for web and mobile applications, conducted user research, and maintained design systems.

**University Name** | 2013 - 2017
